media:group.media:title: Planet atmospheres, ray-sphere intersections.
media:group.media:description:
In this video I create a planet atmosphere effect using ray-sphere intersections.

References:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HFPlKQGChpE
https://gist.github.com/wwwtyro/beecc31d65d1004f5a9d
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mKg426Q8iwM

Godot 3.2 https://godotengine.org/
Krita https://krita.org/en/
(Recording/Editing)

Kdenlive https://kdenlive.org/en/
